text: Very easy to setup and though I have never done stairs before I was able to finish my stairs (cutting and fitting) in one afternoon.  It was a total of 19 treads and risers.  My neighbor had a pro do his stairs.  Took the pro over 3 weeks as he cut the boards wrong and they had to reorder the treads.  He came over to see mine thought my stairs were done much better.  Doing stairs, get it.  Ignore whiney reviews about quality.  The shipping tube it comes in will protect it.

I have a Jet band saw and I too have been dreaming about owning a fence, but aftr reading the reviews her all 36 of them I would not ever consider purchasing this attachment, You would think jet customer service would anser these customer complaints. Evidently they could care  less about us customers,, so MR Jet customer surface person thatk theis and stick it where the sun don't shine.  Yes I was a John deere salesman , partsman, if I treated my customer this way we would have had to lock doors soon.

This is the only car racing game you every need.  It can be taught in minuets to new players.  The game is at its heart a dice rolling game, so some of the decisions are out of your control but there is still enough strategy to make it feel like you are in control of your car.  The extra tracks are a most, the Germany and Spain expansion are very good tracks.  This is one of the few games that can play up to 10 players, which is super fun.

I'm really disappointed in this.  We got it for our son and after one adult driven test drive to see how the controls worked (with no major crashes...a few wall bumps and one ceiling touch, by far nothing hard enough to visibly damage it) and it would not lift off again after that.  No visible damage, no gears stripped, full charge...all it would do after the first 2 minute flight was spin on the ground.  It's repackaged and on it's way back to Amazon as I type.  Save your money.

This is a very Good game. It is so good. You get to play a lot of diffrent characters, like, Obi-Wan Kenobi, Qui-Gon Jinn, Queen Amidala & Captian Panaka. It woyuld be cool if they let you play Jar Jar Binks, but they don't. Oh, weel. Jar jar is one of my Favorite Characters in the film. the best part is you get to battle darth Maul. and it goes along with the movie too. This game rocks. This is a must have game for all star wars fans.If you liked this game then check out all of the other Star wars games

One of the first games released for the Dreamcast, House of the Dead 2 is an instant classic.  The game is identical to the arcade smash with the inclusion of exclusive Dreamcast levels, and the graphics and detailed zombies will leave your mouth watering.  The voice acting is pretty bad though, making the voice acting from the first Resident Evil look like Shakespearian acting, but that is overlooked by the shoot 'em up action.  A light gun is strongly recommended, but the standard DC controler works just as well, somewhat.

Despite my lack of experience with setting up stairs, I found it very easy to accomplish the task in just one afternoon. The staircase consisted of a total of 19 treads and risers. Interestingly, my neighbor opted for a professional for his stairs, which ended up taking over 3 weeks due to incorrect board cuts and the subsequent need to reorder treads. Surprisingly, when he saw my finished stairs, he admitted mine were much better. So, for anyone hesitant about the quality, don't pay attention to negative reviews. The stairs are shipped in a protective tube, ensuring their safety.

Setting up the stairs was a breeze, even though I had no prior experience. Amazingly, I managed to cut and fit all 19 treads and risers in a single afternoon. Contrarily, my neighbor decided to hire a professional for his staircase, and it turned into a three-week-long ordeal due to the incorrect cutting of the boards, leading to the need for replacement treads. When he witnessed the final result of my staircase, he acknowledged that mine was much better. So, don't be discouraged by negative reviews about quality. The stairs are well-protected in the shipping tube.

You will never need another car racing game; this one has it all. Even new players can learn it in just a few minutes. It revolves around rolling dice, which means some choices are beyond your influence, but there is still ample strategy to make you feel like you're truly commanding your car. Additionally, the Germany and Spain expansions offer excellent tracks as a bonus. Moreover, the game stands out by accommodating up to 10 players, making it incredibly enjoyable.

This game has got you covered for all your car racing needs, rendering any other options unnecessary. Its simplicity allows new players to grasp it within minutes, and at its core, it relies on dice rolling, resulting in some factors being outside your control. Nevertheless, the amount of strategy involved ensures that you remain in charge of your car. Furthermore, the Germany and Spain expansions introduce exceptional additional tracks. Remarkably, this game is among the few that can entertain up to 10 players, heightening the fun factor.

Look no further for the ultimate car racing game; this is all you'll ever require. Even beginners can learn it in minutes. The game primarily centers around rolling dice, meaning that certain decisions lie beyond your command. Nonetheless, there remains enough strategic depth for you to feel fully in control of your car. Moreover, the supplementary tracks are an absolute necessity, with the Germany and Spain expansions being particularly notable. Notably, this game stands outs by accommodating up to 10 players, resulting in an immensely enjoyable experience.

No other car racing game is as comprehensive as this one; it satisfies all your needs. New players can easily pick it up within minutes. The game's essence revolves around dice rolling, granting a degree of unpredictability to certain choices, yet allowing for enough strategic elements to make you feel in complete control of your car. Furthermore, the additional tracks, particularly the Germany and Spain expansions, enhance the gaming experience significantly. Notably, this game is among the select few that can accommodate up to 10 players, providing endless fun.

Your search for the ultimate car racing game ends here; you won't need anything else. Even newcomers can grasp its mechanics in a matter of minutes. At its core, it is a dice rolling game, meaning that some decisions are beyond your control. However, there is still a sufficient amount of strategy involved, providing the sensation of being fully in charge of your car. The extra tracks are essential components, and the Germany and Spain expansions, in particular, offer highly enjoyable racing experiences. Remarkably, this game can accommodate up to 10 players, delivering immense levels of fun.

Rest assured, this car racing game fulfills all your needs, leaving no room for other options. Its simplicity allows new players to become familiar with it in just minutes. Fundamentally, it operates as a dice rolling game, thus relinquishing some decision-making power. Nonetheless, strategic elements are present, allowing you to maintain control over your car. Additionally, the supplementary tracks, especially the Germany and Spain expansions, enrich the gameplay greatly. Most impressively, this game is capable of hosting up to 10 players, making it an absolute blast.

I'm extremely let down by this purchase. We bought it for our son and after one test drive led by an adult to understand the controls (with only minor crashes, a few bumps into walls, and one touch of the ceiling, nothing strong enough to cause visible damage), it failed to take off again. Despite having no apparent damage, no stripped gears, and a full charge, it only spun on the ground after the initial 2-minute flight. I've already repackaged it and it is currently being returned to Amazon. Don't waste your money.

This is a huge disappointment. We purchased it for our son, and after a test drive conducted by an adult to assess the controls (with just a few minor crashes, some bumps into walls, and one touch of the ceiling, all without causing any noticeable damage), it refused to take off again. There was no visible damage, no stripped gears, and it had a full charge, but all it did after the first 2-minute flight was spin on the ground. As I type, I am packing it back up to return to Amazon. Save your money.

This game is highly enjoyable because it allows you to embody various iconic characters such as Obi-Wan Kenobi, Qui-Gon Jinn, Queen Amidala, and Captain Panaka. It would be even more amazing if Jar Jar Binks was included, though unfortunately, he is not. Nevertheless, as a fan of the film, having the opportunity to battle Darth Maul is the highlight of this game that perfectly aligns with the movie. Undoubtedly, this game is exceptional and a must-have for all Star Wars enthusiasts. If you appreciated this game, be sure to explore the rest of the Star Wars game collection.

The quality of this game is outstanding, providing players with the chance to assume the roles of various characters like Obi-Wan Kenobi, Qui-Gon Jinn, Queen Amidala, and Captain Panaka. Although it would have been great to play as Jar Jar Binks, that option is not available. Regardless, the inclusion of battling Darth Maul and the seamless integration with the movie make this game incredible. It is highly recommended for all Star Wars fans, and if you enjoyed it, be sure to explore the wide range of other Star Wars games.

This game is incredibly impressive due to its ability to let players inhabit multiple characters, including Obi-Wan Kenobi, Qui-Gon Jinn, Queen Amidala, and Captain Panaka. While it would have been fantastic if Jar Jar Binks could be played, unfortunately, that is not an option. Nevertheless, the opportunity to engage in battles with Darth Maul, accompanied by a storyline that aligns with the movie, adds to the game's allure. Undoubtedly, this game is exceptional and a must-have for all Star Wars enthusiasts. If this game captured your interest, make sure to explore the vast selection of other Star Wars games.

Although it would have been incredible to be able to play as Jar Jar Binks, this feature is unfortunately not included. If you enjoyed this game, be sure to explore the wide array of other Star Wars games available.

The game at hand is a remarkable experience, as it allows players to immerse themselves in the world of Star Wars through the portrayal of various captivating characters, including Obi-Wan Kenobi, Qui-Gon Jinn, Queen Amidala, and Captain Panaka. Although it would have been thrilling if Jar Jar Binks could be selected, unfortunately, that option does not exist. Nevertheless, the opportunity to engage in epic battles against Darth Maul, while following a storyline that perfectly complements the movie, heightens the game's appeal. It is an absolute essential for all Star Wars enthusiasts. If this game has captivated your interest, make sure to explore the extensive catalog of other Star Wars games on offer.

This game is an absolute gem, as it allows players to embody a plethora of beloved characters like Obi-Wan Kenobi, Qui-Gon Jinn, Queen Amidala, and Captain Panaka. While it would have been fantastic to experience playing as Jar Jar Binks, that feature is regrettably absent. Nonetheless, the opportunity to engage in thrilling battles against Darth Maul, all while staying true to the movie's narrative, makes this game truly special. It is a must-have for any dedicated Star Wars fan. If you found enjoyment in this game, be sure to explore the wide range of other Star Wars games available.

An instant classic, House of the Dead 2 for the Dreamcast was one of the earliest games to be released for the console. With the addition of exclusive Dreamcast levels, the game remains faithful to the popular arcade hit and boasts impressive graphics and highly-detailed zombies that are bound to tantalize your taste buds. Admittedly, the voice acting is subpar, making even the first Resident Evil's voice acting seem like a masterpiece of Shakespearian talent. However, this flaw is easily overshadowed by the game's thrilling shoot 'em up action. While a light gun is highly recommended, the standard Dreamcast controller also does a decent job, to some extent.

A true gem among the first games rolled out for the Dreamcast, House of the Dead 2 undoubtedly earns the status of an instant classic. This game faithfully reproduces the exhilarating experience of its arcade predecessor and ups the ante with exclusive Dreamcast levels. Prepare to be captivated by the stunning graphics and intricate details of the zombies, which are sure to make your mouth water. Admittedly, the voice acting falls short, making the first Resident Evil's voiceovers seem like a Shakespearean performance. Nevertheless, this drawback is easily overlooked when immersed in the game's thrilling shoot 'em up action. While a light gun comes highly recommended, the standard Dreamcast controller is also fairly effective - to some extent.

Instantly acquiring a classic status, House of the Dead 2 is among the pioneering games to grace the Dreamcast console. With the inclusion of Dreamcast-exclusive levels, this game remains true to its beloved arcade counterpart. Prepare to be awestruck by the game's impressive visuals and meticulously-designed zombies, which are bound to leave you salivating. However, it must be noted that the voice acting falls short of expectations, making the performances in the first Resident Evil appear as masterpieces of Shakespearian magnitude. Nonetheless, this flaw pales in comparison to the game's captivating shoot 'em up action. While a light gun is strongly recommended, the standard Dreamcast controller also does a commendable job, albeit with some limitations.

House of the Dead 2 secured an instant classic status as one of the inaugural game releases for the Dreamcast. Boasting the addition of exclusive Dreamcast levels, this game faithfully mirrors the acclaimed arcade hit. Get ready to be dazzled by the game's stunning graphics and intricately designed zombies that are guaranteed to whet your appetite. However, it must be acknowledged that the voice acting leaves much to be desired, making the first Resident Evil's voice performances seem like Shakespearean masterpieces. Nevertheless, this drawback is easily overshadowed by the game's action-packed shoot 'em up gameplay. Although a light gun is highly recommended, the standard Dreamcast controller also delivers decent performance, although with some caveats.

Standing tall as one of the pioneer releases for the Dreamcast, House of the Dead 2 quickly cemented its status as an instant classic. True to its arcade counterpart, this game integrates exclusive Dreamcast levels for an enhanced experience. Prepare to be mesmerized by the game's breathtaking graphics and intricately crafted zombies, which will undoubtedly leave you with an insatiable craving. It is worth noting, however, that the voice acting falls short of expectations and even pales in comparison to the first Resident Evil's performances, seemingly lacking the finesse of Shakespearean acting. Nevertheless, this minor flaw is readily dismissed in light of the game's captivating shoot 'em up gameplay. While a light gun is highly recommended, the standard Dreamcast controller also proves quite effective, albeit with some limitations.

One of the pioneering games to grace the Dreamcast console, House of the Dead 2 swiftly garnered the status of a timeless classic. Staying true to the beloved arcade sensation, this game seamlessly incorporates exclusive Dreamcast levels, further elevating the overall experience. Brace yourself for a visual feast, as the game's mesmerizing graphics and meticulously-rendered zombies are sure to tantalize your senses. Admittedly, the voice acting leaves much to be desired, often making the performances in the first Resident Evil seem like Shakespearean masterpieces in comparison. Nevertheless, this slight setback takes a backseat to the game's exhilarating shoot 'em up action. While using a light gun is strongly recommended, the standard Dreamcast controller also offers a reasonably satisfactory experience, albeit with some limitations.
